p: Indo, LPS ( Escherichia coli serotype 0111:B4), λ-carrageenan, and MTT (3-[4, 5-dimethylthiazol-2-yl]-2, 5-diphenyltetrazolium bromide) were obtained from Sigma-Aldrich Co. (USA). Prostaglandin E 2 Express ELISA was from Cayman Chemical (USA). TNF- α, IL-1 β, and IL-6 ELISA were from Boster Biological Engineering Co., Ltd. (China). Anti-iNOS, anti-COX-2 antibody, and anti-NF- κB p65 antibody were from Santa Cruz Biotechnology (USA). BAY 11-7082 (NF- κB inhibitor) was from Beyotime Institute of Biotechnology (China). The 4-amino-5-methylamino-29,79-difluorofluorescein diacetate (DAF-FM diacetate) was from Invitrogen (USA).
